Package equinox.utility

This package contains utility classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CrosshairListenerXYPlot.CrosshairListener
    Interface for crosshair listener.
    DownloadListener
    Interface for download listener.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlphanumComparator
    This is an updated version with enhancements made by Daniel Migowski, Andre Bogus, and David Koelle.
    AlphanumComparator2
    This is an updated version with enhancements made by Daniel Migowski, Andre Bogus, and David Koelle.
    Animator
    Utility class for supplying UI animations.
    CrosshairListenerXYPlot
    Class for crosshair listener plot.
    IncrementAngleFieldListener
    Class for increment angle field listener.
    LegendItemComparator
    This is an updated version with enhancements made by Daniel Migowski, Andre Bogus, and David Koelle.
    MouseDispatcher
    Class for mouse event dispatcher.
    PersistentButtonToggleGroup
    Utility class for persistent toggle group.
    RBCWrapper
    Utility class for readable byte channel wrapper.
    ReportFooter
    Utility class for PDF report footer.
    RfortMaterialTableCell<S,T>
    Utility class for custom combo box table cell.
    Shapes
    Utility class for generating various interface shapes.
    SpinnerListener
    Class for spinner listener.
    Utility
    Utility class.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IllegalLogarithmicRangeException
    Exception to be thrown when a bound value isn't supported by the logarithmic axis

Package equinox.utility Description

This package contains utility classes.
